content: jan s mittens diane pearsall yarn fiber curio and sundries shetland dk held double or badgerface fiber aran gauge 4 5 stitches per inch sizes woman s small/medium needles 5 dpns or long circular to obtain stated gauge cast on 28 32 stitches join in round without twisting edging purl 1 round knit 1 round twice then knit 1 round 2-3 inches of cuff pattern a diagonal ribbing repeat these 4 rounds until desired length round 1 k2/ p2 ribbing round 2 p1/k2/p1 round 3 p2/k2 round 4 k1/p2/k1 b broken rib ribbing repeat these 4 rounds until desired length round 1-3 k1/p1 round 4 purl c moss stitch cuff repeat these 4 rounds until desired length round 1-2 k2 p2 round 3-4 p2 k2 after cuff pattern knit 1 round purl 1 round twice then knit 1 round increasing 4 stitches new total 32 36 stitches ©bearcub designs 1 hand and gusset knit 1 round increasing 1 stitch for the beginning of the gusset here is the placement of that stitch for the left and right mitten right knit 18 20 stitches increase 1 for gusset and knit the remaining 14 16 stitches left knit 14 16 stitches increase 1 for gusset and knit the remaining 18 20 stitches place a marker in the increase to mark the center of the gusset to form the gusset *knit 2 row then increase 1 stitch on either side of the marked stitch * repeat *…* until there are 11 gusset stitches 5 on each side of the center stitch knit 1 round i like place markers on either side of the increases to help me see the gusset forming in the following round knit up to the gusset stitches place the 11 stitches on waste yarn cast on 2 stitches and finish the round new total for hand is 34 38 stitches knit the hand until it is about ½ inch from the desired length of finished mitten then decrease for the tip as follows needles 1 and 2 knit 1 ssk knit until there are 2 stitches left k2tog needles 3 and 4 knit 1 ssk knit until there are 2 stitches left k2tog knit until there are 6 stitches left then cut yarn and pull through stitches pull tight thumb put the 11 gusset stitches on needles knit them and pick up 5 stitches 3 from the cast-on edge and 2 from the sides to close the gap new total 16 stitches knit until the thumb is covered then decrease for tip as you did for the tip of the mitten ©bearcub designs 2
